hadiths.text: Sa, id b. jubair reported that it was said to Ibn 'Abbas that Nauf al-Bikali was of the opinion that Moses who went in search of knowledge was not the Moses of Bani Isra'il. He said:Sa'id, did you hear it from him? I said: Yes. Thereupon he said that Nauf had not stated the fact

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنْ فَضَائِلِ الْخَضِرِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtues Of Al-Khadir, Peace Be Upon Him
